title: Macrowhisper Configuration
description: Configuration schema for Macrowhisper, an automation helper for Superwhisper dictation app. CLI commands create actions with empty values for string fields and null for boolean/numeric fields ‚Äî both fall back to global defaults. Explicit values override global defaults.

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE validation support. Auto detected by Macrowhisper next to binary or in Homebrew's share/macrowhisper folder

defaults.description: Global default settings for all actions

activeAction.description: Name of the currently active action (fallback when no triggers match). Empty string or null means no active action.

icon.description: Default icon for actions (emoji, character, empty string, null, or '.none' for no icon)

moveTo.description: Default location to move recording folders after processing. Path to destination directory, '.delete' (delete folder), '.none' (keep in original location), empty string, or null for no default move behavior

noEsc.description: Disable ESC key simulation before action execution

simKeypress.description: Use keystroke simulation instead of clipboard for text insertion

actionDelay.description: Default delay in seconds before executing actions

history.description: Number of days to retain recording history (null = keep forever, 0 = keep only latest)

pressReturn.description: Automatically press Return/Enter after action execution. This action can be scheduled with --auto-return <true/false> CLI flag.

returnDelay.description: Delay in seconds before pressing Return (if pressReturn is enabled)

restoreClipboard.description: Restore original clipboard content after action execution

scheduledActionTimeout.description: Timeout in seconds for auto-return and scheduled actions when no recording session is active (0 = no timeout, 5 = default)

clipboardStacking.description: Enable clipboard stacking for clipboardContext placeholder. When enabled, multiple clipboard changes during recording are captured and formatted with XML tags (<clipboard_context_1>, <clipboard_context_2>, etc.). When disabled, only the last clipboard change is captured (default behavior).

clipboardBuffer.description: Global clipboard buffer window in seconds for the clipboardContext placeholder. Controls the capture of clipboard content before a recording starts. 0 disables the buffer entirely.

clipboardIgnore.description: Regex pattern to ignore clipboard content from specific applications. Use '|' for multiple apps (e.g., 'AppName|com.bundle.id'). Matches against app name or bundle ID. Empty string or null means no apps are ignored.

autoUpdateConfig.description: Automatically update the configuration file on service startup to apply new schema changes and formatting. When false, startup will not write to the config file. This does not affect manual --update-config.

inserts.description: Text insertion actions with placeholder support. Manage via CLI: --add-insert <name>, --list-inserts, --remove-action <name>

.*.title: Insert Action
.*.description: Action name - defines a text insertion action

urls.description: URL opening actions for web links and applications. Manage via CLI: --add-url <name>, --list-urls, --remove-action <name>

.*.title: URL Action
.*.description: Action name - defines a URL opening action for web links and applications

shortcuts.description: MacOS Shortcut actions. Manage via CLI: --add-shortcut <name>, --list-shortcuts, --remove-action <name>.

.*.title: macOS Shortcut Action
.*.description: Action name - this property name is the actual macOS Shortcut name to execute

scriptsShell.description: Shell script execution actions. Manage via CLI: --add-shell <name>, --list-shell, --remove-action <name>

.*.title: Shell Script Action
.*.description: Action name - defines a shell command execution action

scriptsAS.description: AppleScript execution action. Manage via CLI: --add-as <name>, --list-as, --remove-action <name>

.*.title: AppleScript Action
.*.description: Action name - defines an AppleScript execution action

icon.description: Custom icon for this action. Empty string, null, or omit to use global default. Use '.none' to explicitly show no icon (override global default).

moveTo.description: Where to move the recording folder after processing. Path to destination directory, '.delete' (delete folder), '.none' (keep in original location), empty string, null, or omit to use global default.

noEsc.description: Disable ESC key simulation for this action. null = use global default, true/false = explicit override.

actionDelay.description: Custom delay in seconds before executing this action. null = use global default, number = explicit override.

restoreClipboard.description: Override clipboard restoration setting for this action. null = use global default, true/false = explicit override.

triggerVoice.description: Voice trigger patterns. Use '!' prefix for exceptions and '|' for multiple triggers. Normal patterns are treated as prefix matches and will be stripped from the start of result/swResult when matched. Wrap in '==' (e.g., '==^google this\.?$==') to enable full regex matching without stripping. Empty string, null, or omit means no trigger.

triggerApps.description: Regex pattern for application trigger matching (app name or bundle ID). Use '!' prefix for exceptions and '|' for multiple triggers. null or empty string means no trigger.

triggerModes.description: Regex pattern for Superwhisper mode trigger matching. Use '!' prefix for exceptions and '|' for multiple triggers. null or empty string means no trigger.

triggerLogic.description: Logic for combining multiple triggers. Can be 'and' or 'or'. null defaults to 'or'.

action.title: Insert Action Content
action.description: Text to insert with placeholder support. Use '.autoPaste' for smart paste behavior, '.none' or empty string to skip insertion and not auto-close Superwhisper's window.

simKeypress.description: Use keystroke simulation instead of clipboard for this action. null = use global default, true/false = explicit override.

pressReturn.description: Automatically press Return after this action. null = use global default, true/false = explicit override.

action.title: URL to Open
action.description: URL with placeholder support. This field is required and cannot be empty.

openWith.description: Specific application or bundle id to open the URL with. Empty string, null, or omit uses system default.

openBackground.description: Open URL in background without focusing the application. null = use global default, true/false = explicit override.

shortcutAction.description: The action name is the actual Shortcut name to execute.

action.description: Input to pass to the shortcut with placeholder support. Use '.none' or empty string to run the shortcut without any input.

icon.description: Custom icon for this shortcut action. Empty string, null, or omit to use global default. Use '.none' to explicitly show no icon (override global default).

moveTo.description: Where to move the recording folder after processing this shortcut. Path to destination directory, '.delete' (delete folder), '.none' (keep in original location), empty string, null, or omit to use global default.

noEsc.description: Disable ESC key simulation for this shortcut. null = use global default, true/false = explicit override.

actionDelay.description: Custom delay in seconds before executing this shortcut. null = use global default, number = explicit override.

restoreClipboard.description: Override clipboard restoration setting for this shortcut. null = use global default, true/false = explicit override.

triggerVoice.description: Voice trigger patterns. Use '!' prefix for exceptions and '|' for multiple triggers. Normal patterns are treated as prefix matches and will be stripped from the start of result/swResult when matched. Wrap in '==' (e.g., '==^google this\.?$==') to enable full regex matching without stripping. Empty string, null, or omit means no trigger.

triggerApps.description: Regex pattern for application trigger matching (app name or bundle ID). Use '!' prefix for exceptions and '|' for multiple triggers. null or empty string means no trigger.

triggerModes.description: Regex pattern for Superwhisper mode trigger matching. Use '!' prefix for exceptions and '|' for multiple triggers. Empty string, null, or omit means no trigger.

triggerLogic.description: Logic for combining multiple triggers. Can be 'and' or 'or'. null or omit uses default 'or' logic.

action.title: Shell Command
action.description: Shell command with placeholder support and proper escaping. This field is required and cannot be empty.

action.title: AppleScript Code
action.description: AppleScript code with placeholder support and proper quote escaping. This field is required and cannot be empty.
examples: tell application "TextEdit" to make new document with properties {text:"{{json:swResult}}"}
tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Sample Macro" with parameter "{{swResult}}"
